attributes.action: Stop supermarkets wasting so much food.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public have been asked by the goverment not to waste food for environmental reasons but nothing has been asked of the supermarkets who at the end of the day throw food items in the bin that needs to be sold that day. Why not give it away to charities (homeless or animal) who could use it? Surely the public are not the only people throwing perfectly good food in landfill.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
